explains: n. 爆炸；爆炸声；引爆，爆发；（内燃机的）爆燃，爆鸣
wordGroup: detonation velocity 爆炸速度；起爆速度

sentences.en: The thermal decomposition and detonation of lead azide crystals are studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了叠氮化铅晶体的热分解和爆炸过程。

sentences.en: Most electronic equipment within 1,000 miles of a high-altitude nuclear detonation could be affected.
sentences.cn: 高海拔核爆炸1000英里以内的大部分电子设备都有可能受到影响。
